InstructionData.Title: Advanced Furnace IC 2
InstructionData.Author: Saddamo De Beers
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias AdvancedFurnaceScrew d0 alias Dial3 d1 alias Lever2 d2 alias Lever d3 alias ActiveVentoZ d4
start:
Start:
ls r1 d0 0 OccupantHash l r0 d3 Setting
l r5 d1 Setting l r6 d2 Setting
s d0 Open r0 s db Setting r1
s d4 Mode r5 s d4 On r6
yield
j start
